Package osyfe

Welcome to the Osyfe Game Library.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Deletable
    Marks resources that have to be deleted after use.
    Overlay
    Interface for game overlays which can be added to the Screen class.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    InputEvent
    Represents an input event.
    Log
    Manages error and warning messages.
    Screen
    Handles the screen output and related features, the input and the game loop.
    Settings
    The game settings, which have to be set before the Screen.open call.
    Utils
    Provides some utility methods.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    InputEvent.Type
    The event types.
    Screen.CursorState
    The cursor states.

Package osyfe Description

Welcome to the Osyfe Game Library. It is based on LWJGL 3 and constitutes a rather thin wrapper around the core functionality with the goal to hide completely the native libraries, yet leaving open some relevant low level details.

This package contains the classes for the screen, input, logs, game loop and overlays.
Uses GLFW, STB and OpenGL.
